form.comp_loca: Levelling Of Base Frame by spirit level
form.check: Check point Before starting the compressor
form.confirm: Confirm condition of Compressor for mechaical damage like - corrossion,dents,kincks,etc.,
form.confirm_crank: Confirm crankcase is cleaned thorughly of any foreign object and dust.Check condition of lube oil carry pipe lines
form.confirm_sight: Confirm sight glass- visible/level mark/No damage
form.confirm_grade: Confirm correct grade/Qty Oil filled up to top mark of oil level sight glass in crankcase and secondary filter body.By rotating flywheel ensure oil flows through the loose connection of oil pr.Gauge pipe line
form.con_leveling: Confirm leveling and lightening of all foundation anchor bolts of Motor & Compressor
form.che_pedestal: Check pedestal bearing alignment if provided
form.con_aligment: Confirm Alignment of Flywheel & Motor pulley and belt tension
form.suction_discharge: Check condition of all suction and discharge valves and service as required
form.check_piston: Check Piston end clearance and adjust if required
form.con_capacity: Check capacity control wiring connection as per -KPCL CIRCUIT DAIGRAM Supplied with control box
form.check_tightness: Confirm tightness of all mounting bolts
form.confirm_foundation: Check foundation is painted with water proof and oil proof cement paint
form.check_sufficient: Check sufficient cooling water at required pressure is available and water flows freely in all the outlet pipes
form.check_pointa: Check Points After starting the Compressor on Open Air Run Test
form.conf_oil: Confirm Oil Pressure is indicated on the oil pump pressure gauge
form.check_operation: Check plunger operation and oil flow in visual indicator in cylinder lubricators(for lube models only)
form.check_point: Check Points After starting the Compressor on system
form.rec_2stage: Gradually close the value at receiver outlet to register 2nd stage pr.Of 3.0kg/cm2 to observe performance
form.rec_regis: Gradually close the value at receiver outlet to register 2nd stage pr.of 5.0kg/cm2 to observe performance
form.rec_outlet: Gradually close the value at receiver outlet to register rated pressure to observe performance
form.unload_load: Check loading/unloading is taking place at specifed pr.
form.con_pration: Check operation of 1st and 2st stage safety value
form.con_low: Confirm functioning of low oil/water pr.s/w
form.volt: No.Of feed drops 1st Stage and 2nd Stage(lube Model)
form.high_temp: Current drawn by motor on full load/unload
form.main_chart: Maintenance chart displayed at compressor room
form.air_oilfilter: Air/ Oil filter replacement log sheet as per Maintenance
form.training: Training provided on Do's & Don'ts /preventive maintenance of the compressor:
form.service_engineer: Service Engineer / Rep has been Relieved After Satisfactory Completion of Job
form.caption: Additional Photo
